collection: **Data Collection:** No personal information is actively gathered from GPTs.

Interaction data, such as selected text and generated interactions, is
collected purely to process user inquiries and to improve service performance.
sharing:
## Data Sharing

**Processing Requests:** When GPTs initiate requests to YouTube to Knowledge
Service servers, these may be forwarded to OpenAI, Microsoft, or subsequent AI
service providers.

Data sharing is confined to the content provided by the
GPTs, ChatGPT and their generated queries.
